topbar.profile.title: Profile summary
topbar.profile.description.summary: My name is NGUYEN LE PHONG. I am 24 years old, I was born in BINH THUAN but currently I live and work in Ho Chi Minh City. I am waiting to receive a diploma from Ho Chi Minh City University of Agriculture and Forestry, majoring in Information Technology. I am a programmer have good knowledge of the Java and ReactJS. Here is my personal information:
topbar.profile.description.strengths.des: I have 6 months working experience at Proptech Plus
I have 8 months working experience at Splus Software
I am a person with high responsibility for work
Being easy to get along with, willing to help others when possible
I have the ability to manage good personal time
Easily adapt to team work environment
Ability to analyze problems, solve problems
topbar.profile.description.weaknesses.de: Sometimes talking alone while looking for a solution to solve a task
Foreign language communication (English) is not fluent
topbar.profile.description.hobby.descrip: I am a technology enthusiast, applying technology in practice
Enjoy watching movies (movies can bring life skills enhancement lessons), singing on weekends, holidays with friends and relatives
Enjoy reading new technology news, new applications to cut wind with friends when you have free time
topbar.profile.pf-sumary.some_video_titl: Báo cáo giữa kỳ môn học thương mại điện tử

topbar.menu_skill.title: Skill
topbar.skill.proframming_language.descri: Having spent 8 semesters of JAVA learning programming language at school, and having more than 1 year working with this language in the backend, so I am very confident in knowledge and good use of this programming language. Spring boot is one of the framework that I use fluently in this language
Know how to use HTML programming language, understand the semantic structure of HTML tags
Good use of CSS during site beautification, mastering CSS preprocessors like: SCSS, SASS, LESS
There is an understanding of Javascript language, and this is the language I really like
topbar.skill.framworks.description1: Using ReactJS through 4 real projects (3 ReactJS, 1 React Typescript)
topbar.skill.framworks.description2: Proficiently use UI / UX support libraries for React like Ant Design, React semantic, React Bootstrap, Material-UI
topbar.skill.framworks.description3: Regularly use third party libraries such as Axios, Fetch API, React router, Redux, Redux thunk
topbar.skill.framworks.description4: Using ReactNative through 3 mobile projects (savyu application, student attendance application via face recognition, tenancy management application)
topbar.skill.database.description1: Fluent in using Microsoft SQL Server & MySql database management system
topbar.skill.database.description2: Understand basic level of MongoDB through subject projects
topbar.skill.deploy.description1: I used to deploy a project including Frontend, ReactJS, Backend, Spring boot, Database, MySql (Amazon service) on 2 different Ubuntu Servers
topbar.skill.deploy.description2: Having learned about the basic docker, but not really applied to any project, I hope I can use it this year
topbar.skill.other.description1: Proficient in IDE such as VSCode, Eclipse, Atom, ...
topbar.skill.other.description3: Use good Github tool to manage sourcecode, version
topbar.skill.other.description4: Has ever managed work, assigned tasks, received tasks through Visual Studio Team Services & RedMine tool
topbar.skill.other.description5: In addition, I also have good communication and presentation skills

topbar.project_chess.title: Games chess
topbar.project_chess.subtitle: Artificial Intelligence
topbar.project_chess.description: This project is the final project of the introductory course of artificial intelligence. The purpose of this project is to apply algorithms, search algorithms from basic to high level in games, games can be played with machines and players with many different algorithms.

topbar.project_shoppingweb.description: This project is the final project of the 4-member Web Programming course and I'm the leader. It was great when our team got all 10 points. This video link recorded the moment I reported.
